title: Fix header logo to match the originally uploaded image

requirements.text: Update the application header logo so the displayed image matches the originally uploaded/provided logo (the user reports the current logo is not the same). Ensure the header continues to load the logo as a static asset from frontend/public/assets/generated (no backend routing).

quotes: The logo is not that same

acceptanceCriteria: When the app loads, the header logo visually matches the originally uploaded/provided logo.
The logo is served as a static file under frontend/public/assets/generated and is referenced by a /assets/generated/... path in the frontend.
No logo image is fetched via the backend canister; there are no backend routes/handlers for image serving.

requirements.text: Remove the branding regression risk by making the logo reference unambiguous: ensure App.tsx references the corrected logo filename and that the referenced file exists in frontend/public/assets/generated.

quotes: The logo is not that same

acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/App.tsx references a logo filename that exists in frontend/public/assets/generated.
The alt text remains in English and continues to describe the logo appropriately.
A hard refresh shows the corrected logo (not the old/mismatched one).

constraints: Do not edit files in frontend/src/components/ui (read-only UI component sources).
Do not edit immutable hook/entry paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx.
Keep backend as a single Motoko actor; no backend changes are required for this logo fix.
nonGoals: Do not change login behavior, product management behavior, or localStorage persistence.
Do not introduce new authentication providers or any third-party image hosting/CDN.
Do not change the app name text "RAJESH KURKURE GARHWA" in the header/footer/title.

edits: Replace the logo artwork so it matches the originally uploaded/provided logo (rajesh-kurkure-garhwa-logo.dim_256x256.png > rajesh-kurkure-garhwa-logo-corrected.dim_256x256.png)
